params.length: the number of samples to generate.
params.musicBytecode: the evm bytecode that the Bleep Machine will execute in a loop.
params.start: sample offset at which the music starts.

_create(bytes).details: Creates a new contract that generate the music from a given start offset and length.

params.musicBytecode: the evm bytecode the Bleep Machine will execute in a loop.

returns.executor: address of the contract that will generate samples when executed.

params.length: the number of samples to generate.
params.musicBytecode: the evm bytecode that the Bleep Machine will execute in a loop.
params.start: sample offset at which the music starts.

params.addr: address of any contract. Most will generate noises.

WAV(bytes,uint256,uint256).notice: Generates a WAV file (8 bits, 8000Hz, mono) from EVM bytecode (`musicBytecode`) with a specific offset and length.

generate(bytes,uint256,uint256).notice: Generates raw 8 bits samples from EVM bytecode (`musicBytecode`) with a specific offset and length.

listenTo(address).notice: Generates a WAV file (8 bits, 8000Hz, mono) from contract's code at specific address.
